Uses of Class
edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl.ExplicitStream

Packages that use ExplicitStream
edu.stanford.math.plex4.examples   
edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl   
 

Uses of ExplicitStream in edu.stanford.math.plex4.examples
 

Methods in edu.stanford.math.plex4.examples that return ExplicitStream
static ExplicitStream<Simplex> SimplexStreamExamples.getCircle(int m)
          This function returns a simplicial circle with m vertices in it.
static ExplicitStream<Simplex> SimplexStreamExamples.getFilteredTriangle()
          This function returns a filtered triangle where each simplex enters at a new filtration index.
static ExplicitStream<Simplex> SimplexStreamExamples.getOctahedron()
          This function returns a simplicial octahedron.
static ExplicitStream<Simplex> SimplexStreamExamples.getSimplicialSphere(int dimension)
          This function returns a static simplicial complex containing an n-sphere.
static ExplicitStream<Simplex> SimplexStreamExamples.getTetrahedron()
          This function returns a simplicial tetrahedron (which happens to be equal to a simplicial 2-sphere).
static ExplicitStream<Simplex> SimplexStreamExamples.getTorus()
          This function returns a simplicial 2-torus.
static ExplicitStream<Simplex> SimplexStreamExamples.getTriangle()
          This function returns a simplicial triangle (which happens to be equal to a simplicial 1-sphere).
static ExplicitStream<Simplex> SimplexStreamExamples.getZomorodianCarlssonExample()
          This function returns a filtered simplicial complex which is shown in Figure 1 of the paper "Computing Persistent Homology" by Zomorodian and Carlsson.
 

Uses of ExplicitStream in edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl
 

Subclasses of ExplicitStream in edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.impl
 class ExplicitCellStream
          This class is a wrapper for the ExplicitStream class and provides convenience functions when the base elements are cells.
 class ExplicitSimplexStream
          This class is a wrapper for the ExplicitStream class and provides convenience functions when the base elements are simplices.
